EmailTemplate.name: Sept 2015 feedback from resources/activities
EmailTemplate.subject: Your feedback on this year's Live Different resources?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for hosting our Live Different team at {!Account.Name} recently! I am wondering if you would be able to help give some quick feedback regarding the Transition Activity Lesson Plan and Poster Wall activity that we leave behind with schools following the presentation? It is very valuable for us to find out early in the school year how these resources are working, so that we can make beneficial changes and updates.
https://www.tfaforms.com/forms/view/393397?tfa_421={!Account.Name}&tfa_422={!Contact.FirstName}&%20&{!Contact.LastName}&tfa_423={!Account.Id}&tfa_429={!Contact.Email}
Thank you so much for your help and advice towards improving the work we do in schools.
Kind Regards,
Ryan Wood
â€‹ Ryan Wood Director of Operations Live Different Suite B3 - 15 Wellington St. North Hamilton, ON L8R 1M7 Canada
905-929-1662 Cell 905-777-1662 Office 905-777-8117 Fax ryan@livedifferent.com
